name: BoudicaMelodieConversation
_source: s;Boudica;It's been so long...{w} I didn't think I'd again lay eyes on you.
s;Melodie;I have never met you! Do not grab me in such a way!
s;Boudica;You... are mistaken.{w} I am your mother, Melodie.
s;Melodie;My mother is living peacefully in my village.|And she certainly does not look like you!
s;Boudica;No, you misunderstand. I am the mother of your past life.
s;Boudica;Our people believe that each soul is reincarnated.|For my Melodie to have been taken and now...|To see you here...|It is the blessing of the Fates.
s;Melodie;My people know no such stories.{w} I have had enough of this madness.|Goodbye.
s;Boudica;Oh, Melodie... Ever so quick to anger.
s;Melodie;Enough of your delusions!{w} End this, now!
s;Boudica;Have I upset you? I only meant to-
s;Melodie;You have been watching me! You leave gifts!|I am not your daughter!
s;Boudica;I am sorry that you are not ready to face the truth.|You are her. A mother knows it.
s;Melodie;And you have drank from sap too deeply!|I am not your daughter, and I will not player her role.|I spit on your "gifts"!
s;Boudica;Melodie... do not point your bow at-
s;Melodie;Let your next word be chosen wisely.
s;Boudica;I will give you space, if that is what you need.
s;Melodie;I am finished with your madness.{w} Do not let it bother me again.
